title: vAzhga svayamprakAsha
sahitya:
vAzhga svayamprakAsha shuddha shakti Om shUzhga ulagamellAm jyOti Anandam


anupallavi

  Ezhulagum jIvan mukti inbam OngavE idayamAna iraivanan anbing-udayamAgavE
pAzhum tIya UzhvinaigaL paTTozhigavE parama sccidAnandattin pAl pozhigavE


caraNam    kaTTaDimaik-kavalaiyemmai viTTu vilagavE kaNnulagil viNNarasu kANap-poligavE
eTTu dikkum dEvagAnam edirolikkavE eNNamellAm puNNiyap-payan pazhukkavE
